title: National Team Service & Experience Coordinator - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: National Team Service & Experience Coordinator Sports Management Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for planning and executing our National Team customer service and experience plan. The customer service and experience coordinator will serve as the day-to-day person in charge....   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
